ygData.subject: Re: Hello Everyone
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I d be very willing to help make a GLBT guild on Brell Serilis. I d even play a goody-goody to help play well with the rest of you.  :-) (Given my penchant
ygData.messageBody:
>Perhaps we should consider David's idea of setting up this "GLBT" guild on
>the new roleplaying server, Brell Serilis. We could all start from scratch
>and learn about each other in a group of the same level. Sirenia is a Level
>24 High Elven Cleric, but I would be willing to give it all up to start
>again with all of you if you are interested. Then I am certain we would
>have enough members to form a guild there. What does everyone think of
>this?

I'd be very willing to help make a GLBT guild on Brell Serilis.

I'd even play a goody-goody to help play well with the rest of you. :-)

(Given my penchant for Dark Elves, this is weird for me...;-)

Maybe a hunky Barbarian...hmmm...

Alex
